. . . . . . . . . . . . . .', '. .', 'Life can get busy and stressful, and this is precisely why the place that you call home is so important.', 'When you have a quiet, safe, and beautiful place to put your feet up at the end of a long day, it makes facing tomorrow that much easier.', 'The Lofts at Farmers Market strives to create a peaceful oasis in the heart of Saint Paul, Minnesota where you can relax, refresh, and rejuvenate.', "Lofts at Farmers Market offers studio, one, and two bedroom floor plans that are elegantly designed with the modern conveniences that you're searching for.", 'Each unit comes with spectacular high ceilings, modern stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, cozy kitchen islands with sleek granite counters, and a full-sized washer and dryer.', 'Our community amenities also make the Lofts an exceptional place to live.', 'Work out in our 24-hour fitness center and enjoy the views from our green rooftop terrace complete with fire pit and grill.', 'Before work, be sure to stop by our coffee bar to help start the day off right.', "We're also a pet-friendly community, welcoming cats and certain dog breeds.", 'We even have an on-site pet washing station to keep your furry friend looking and smelling great!', '. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
